text: Frances Hussey Sternhagen (January 13, 1930 - November 27, 2023) was an American actress. Sternhagen appeared on- and off-Broadway, in movies, and on TV since the 1950s.Joy, Cara."Frances Sternhagen in Talks to Join Company of Broadway Magnolias" Broadway.com, November 22, 2004 She is known for her role as Richard Farnsworth's wife in Misery (1990). She may be also best known to TV audiences as Esther Clavin, mother of John Ratzenberger's Boston postman character Cliff Clavin, on the long-running series Cheers for which she received two Emmy Award nominations. On November 27, 2023, Sternhagen died of natural causes at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:Drama Desk Award winners Category:Saturn Award winners Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C. title: Frances Sternhagen
